condition.description: The expression to evaluate before each iteration. The loop continues as long as this is true.

breakCondition.description: An expression that when true will exit the loop.

continueCondition.description: An expression that when true will skip to the next iteration.

next.description: The node(s) to execute in each iteration if the condition is true.

loopEnd.description: The node(s) to execute when the loop condition evaluates to false.
